title: Handle Food Allergy Inquiry
description: A guest with a severe peanut allergy asks a concession stand worker which items are safe for them to eat.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the seriousness of the request.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent treats the inquiry with appropriate care.

tasks.description: Access the digital allergen guide for all food items sold at the venue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the allergen information on their terminal.

tasks.description: Filter the guide for items that are free from peanuts and are not subject to cross-contamination.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a list of safe items (e.g., pre-packaged gluten-free snacks, bottled water).

tasks.description: Clearly communicate the safe options to the guest and advise them to avoid items like unpackaged baked goods.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides accurate and helpful information to ensure the guest's safety.
